title: Classic TV Sponsors & Ads
description: In the early days of TV, shows were often named after their sponsors. How well do you remember the commercial side of classic television?

questions.question: Which oil company sponsored 'Texaco Star Theater' starring Milton Berle?
Which cigarette brand was the original sponsor of 'I Love Lucy'?
Which food company sponsored 'Kraft Television Theatre' for over a decade?
On early TV, the Timex watch company became famous for ads featuring what tagline?
options: 'Takes a licking and keeps on ticking'

questions.question: Which appliance company sponsored 'General Electric Theater' hosted by Ronald Reagan?

Which soap brand was so associated with daytime dramas that the entire genre was named after it?
Which automotive company sponsored Dinah Shore's variety show, inspiring her famous sign-off song?

Which steel company sponsored a prestigious dramatic anthology series in the 1950s?
In early television, what was it common for show hosts and actors to do during commercial breaks?
